tool_description: Find charging stations all over the world.
name: Next Charging Station
title: Next Charging Station

api_list.name: Charging Station Details
api_list.description: Getting detailed information about a given charging station based on their id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://next-charging-station.p.rapidapi.com/location/tags/9044570"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "next-charging-station.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://next-charging-station.p.rapidapi.com/location/tags/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "next-charging-station.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Next Charging Station
api_list.description:
Getting parking lots within a given bounding box.

DensityLevel must be between 3 and 15.

There is a maximum of 2000 charging stations per request.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://next-charging-station.p.rapidapi.com/location/47.81044567924743/50.07041759918306/8.43979339599611/12.08176116943361/9"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "next-charging-station.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://next-charging-station.p.rapidapi.com/location/{latmin}/{latmax}/{lngmin}/{lngmax}/{densitylevel}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "next-charging-station.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
